segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me where I can get a shopping basket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Madam . It is at the entrance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I can't find the way to the entrance . Would you tell me where the entrance is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . By the way , where are the vegetables ?
segments.speaker: S1
